sp_instance.title: Welcome
sp_instance.widget_parameters:
{ "html": { "value": "

Treat a Team

Recognize an I&MT Team for a recent win by sending them a Team Shout Out!

The team must include at least 3 I&MT members, and tell us how the team worked together to elevate service delivery and demonstrate our key results. The team Shout Out will be sent directly to the team member and their manager, and will be promoted on our Recognition Board.

How it works

An office admin will receive the request and choose a day/time to order and deliver the treats to the team.

", "displayValue": "

Treat a Team

Recognize an I&MT Team for a recent win by sending them a Team Shout Out!

The team must include at least 3 I&MT members, and tell us how the team worked together to elevate service delivery and demonstrate our key results. The team Shout Out will be sent directly to the team member and their manager, and will be promoted on our Recognition Board.

How it works

An office admin will receive the request and choose a day/time to order and deliver the treats to the team.

" } }
